title: wine_Portfolio_2011_Limited_Edition_Red_(Napa_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 118960.
country: US.
description: This is a tiny-production blend of 82% Cabernet Sauvignon and 18% Cabernet Franc, the latter sourced from Detert East Vineyard along the Oakville bench, the former from Hendry Ranch in western Napa. Made by Genevieve Janssens, it has an old-world soul with plenty of California complexity, balanced in woody notes of coconut flake and black cherry, the tannins are fine-grained and integrated. A simply gorgeous wine..
designation: Limited Edition.
points: 95.
price: 140.0.
province: California.
region_1: Napa Valley.
region_2: Napa.
taster_name: Virginie Boone.
